Description: As an entrant, I want to join the waiting list for a specific event
As an entrant, I want to leave the waiting list for a specific event
As an entrant, I want to be able to see a list of events that I can join the waiting list for
As an entrant, I want to filter events based on my interests and availability
As an entrant, I want to provide my personal information such as name, email and optional phone number in the app
As an entrant, I want to update information such as name, email and contact information on my profile
As an entrant, I want to have a history of events I have registered for, whether I was selected or not
Todo: Make new list that has all events registered

Description: As an entrant, I want to delete my profile if I no longer wish to use the app
Todo: upon deletion, trigger callback to unregister from all lists

Description: As an entrant, I want to receive notification when I am chosen to participate from the waiting list (when I "win" the lottery)
As an entrant, I want to receive notification of when I am not chosen on the app (when I "lose" the lottery)
As an entrant, I want to opt out of receiving notifications from organizers and admins
As an entrant, I want another chance to be chosen from the waiting list if a selected user declines an invitation to sign up
Todo: upon declining invitation, trigger callback to select another random user

Description: As an entrant, I want to be able to accept the invitation to register/sign up when chosen to participate in an event
As an entrant, I want to be able to decline an invitation when chosen to participate in an event
As an entrant, I want to know how many total entrants are on the waiting list for an event
As an entrant, I want to be informed about the criteria or guidelines for the lottery selection process
As an entrant, I want to view event details within the app by scanning the promotional QR code
As an entrant, I want to be able to be sign up for an event from the event details
As an entrant, I want to be identified by my device, so that I don't have to use a username and password
As an organizer I want to create a new event and generate a unique promotional QR code that links to the event description and event poster in the app.
As an organizer, I want to set a registration period.
As an organizer I want to view the list of entrants who joined my event waiting list
As an organizer I want to see on a map where entrants joined my event waiting list from.
As an organizer I want to enable or disable the geolocation requirement for my event.
As an organizer I want to OPTIONALLY limit the number of entrants who can join my waiting list.
As an organizer I want to upload an event poster to the event details page to provide visual information to entrants.
As an organizer I want to update an event poster to provide visual information to entrants.
As an organizer I want to send a notification to chosen entrants to sign up for events (This is the notification that they "won" the lottery.)
As an organizer I want to set the system to sample a specified number of attendees to register for the event.
As an organizer I want to be able to draw a replacement applicant from the pooling system when a previously selected applicant cancels or rejects the invitation.
As an organizer I want to view a list of all chosen entrants who are invited to apply
As an organizer I want to see a list of all the cancelled entrants.
As an organizer I want to see a final list of entrants who enrolled for the event
As an organizer I want to cancel entrants that did not sign up for the event
As an organizer I want to export a final list of entrants who enrolled for the event in CSV format
As an organizer I want to send notifications to all entrants on the waiting list
As an organizer I want to send notifications to all selected entrants
As an organizer I want to send a notification to all cancelled entrants
As an administrator, I want to be able to remove events
As an administrator, I want to be able to remove profiles
As an administrator, I want to be able to remove images
As an administrator, I want to be able to browse events
As an administrator, I want to be able to browse profiles
As an administrator, I want to be able to browse images that are uploaded so I can remove them if necessary
As an administrator I want to remove organizers that violate app policy
As an administrator, I want to review logs of all notifications sent to entrants by organizers
